sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' const PopupCard = ({ visible, setVisible, country }) => { console.log(country) return (

More About the Country

{country.name}

Native Name:

{country.nativeName}

Population:

{country.population}

Region:

{country.region}

Sub Region:

{country.subregion}

Capital:

{country.capital}

) } export default PopupCard
